revised_title: Fine Structure and Histochemistry of Copepod Systems: A Study on Calanus finmarchicus
tldr: This study examines the fine structure and histochemistry of various systems in the copepod Calanus finmarchicus. The research focuses on the alimentary canal, musculature, and other body systems using electron microscopy and histochemical tests. The findings reveal unique features of the microvilli in the mid-gut, the organization of the muscular layers, and the presence of various proteins, carbohydrates, and lipids in the tissues.
